page.title: 20Gildingwells
page.content: In 1927 there were only 5{ farms,} three of which were only small. Today in{Gildingwells}we found only one{farm there.All the others have been merged into{houses}and the disused{farms}have been converted into homes for businessmen. In 1927 all{farms}had to milk cows as well as arable fields.Today there are not any milk cows in the village. The whole of Gildingwells was built in the early 17th century in limestone. Since 1946 there have only been 9 new {houses}built in brick.The population of{Gildingwells}is 92,the same as 1927.In 1927 there was only 1{car} there,today every{house}in {Gildingwells}has one.In{Gildingwells} there are 30{houses}(including farm houses).Most are old except nine. The main feature of{Gildingwells}is agriculture.
